sites.jaName: ぼくのたどりつくばしょ
sites.description: This is exactly what this site is about; it was created to show what services and sites BKTSK.com has to offer.
This is my personal blog. I report on my activities as a freelancer and introduce the things I have made.
hacoSHA! is an experimental LGBT-friendly photography event. It is designed to provide information about photography events taking place around the country.
